This is my test gallery application for admission to mobile development school by

It allows user to operate with one of the most famous photohostings Flickr.com through it`s API.

Application provides possibility to search images by tags and text query, moreover some additional searching functions, as, for example, context menu with options to find all other images of "that one you`re interested in" owner. Besides, it allows result sorting by methods, supported by API, and choosing image size for detailed view (as far not all of them - especially old ones - are presented in all size combination on Flickr).

On start, application provides to user a list of Flickr recent uploaded photos. Rather selfexplanatory, sorting won`t work now, but, surprisingly, content filtration won`t too in this Flickr API method. So far, it`s hosting authors` to ask - why. =)

You can download images you`ve found worth it or share their link with others

Detailed view activity realized with ViewPager and ImageViewTouch, that allows navigation through images with swiping, and also provides zooming function.

Image loading and caching are done with Glide library, API interactions with Retrofit, and managing inner database - with ROOM + LiveData.
